scenario_text.value:
Oh, hey, Minoru. Didn’t expect to find you
here.
Hm? You seem down.

I think you will find he is merely calm,
rather than “down.” Isn’t that so, Minoru?

Yeah, I just needed to clear my head.
Everyone is so...divided...

Not that I’m exactly the most cooperative
guy, myself...

Really? But you get along with everyone,
Minoru.

Ha... The truth is, I’ve got a rotten
personality.

I get along just to get by. It’s nothing to
be proud of.

I can talk a good game, but that doesn’t help
much with all these monsters. Not at all.
Minoru...
(Minoru’s not usually this negative.)

(Maybe it’ll help if I let him talk about
what’s on his mind.)
(What should I ask Minoru about?)
How are you feeling?
What’s going on?
What’s our next move?
How’s our situation?
How do you feel?

Oh, don’t get the wrong idea! I’m not
depressed or anything!

I’m actually pretty excited. Can’t wait to
see what happens next!
What’s going on?

So, what do you think’s actually going on
right now?

Uh...beats me! It kinda feels like we’re in
some weird kinda sci-fi story, though.

Definitely the sort of thing you’d only
expect to see in fiction.

But there’s no use crying about it, right?
Might as well enjoy it.

You could live your whole life and never see
anything like this! And it’s happening now!

You sure have an interesting way of looking
at things.
Sci-fi? Fiction? What are those?

Hm, I too am uncertain, but from how Minoru
speaks of them, they must be enjoyable.
Then I bet I’d like them!
What’s our next move?

So, what do you think our next move should
be?

Adventure, of course! Let’s go adventuring!
We’ve got monster partners backing us up!

We ought to get out there and explore this
place! There’s no point just sitting around!
That’s...quite the approach.
Right?! I’ll totally make it big some day!

(Minoru’s kidding around, but I can still
hear the trembling in his voice...)
How’s our situation?

What do you make of our current situation,
Minoru? This all seems like fun to you?

I’m being optimistic, it’s true. But we can’t
act like this is some funeral all the time.

That’s why...I wanna be a little upbeat, you
know?

(Yeah. It’s not like Minoru’s oblivious, but
he’s trying to stay fired up...)

As for our situation, here’s what I think.
We’ve been thrown into another dimension.

At first I thought we might be in the future,
but that doesn’t make any sense...

And this isn’t some movie set, either.
We talked about that.

It’s probably the least realistic answer, but
it might just be the truth.

So think about it. If we accept that this is
what happened, how did we get here?

And since we made it here somehow, there’s
got to be a way back, right?!

Yeah, you’re right. That makes a lot of
sense.

Good thinking, Minoru. Very cool and level-
headed of you.
Amazing, Minoru!
I know, right?!

And then there’s this screwed-up message!
I bet it’s the key to getting out of here!

What, all this nonsense? I dunno... You sure
about that?

Hey, I’m just saying it might be a clue or
something. Gotta turn over every stone!
Anyway...yeah. We shouldn’t give up just yet.

I guess not. You sure are something else,
Minoru.
(Was there anything else I wanted to ask?)
That’s all.
There’s more.

So, that’s what I’ve been thinking. Was it
any help?
It was a big help, thanks.

Of course, we’ll need to get everyone’s
opinion before we settle anything.

Yeah, I know. Good luck thinking up something
that’ll get us all on the same page!

(Get us all on the same page, huh? Minoru can
seem thoughtless, but he really does care.)

Good luck finding a way to get us all on the
same page!
